body.p: The following functions, which are provided by functions.sh, can be used for displaying informational messages.

tr.ti: Display an informational message with no trailing newline.
Display an informational message, to be logged if logging is enabled.
Display the message for the start of an action block.
Display the end of an action block.

body.p: The following are available from eutils.eclass . ebeep and epause are deprecated in EAPIS 0, 1 and 2 in favor of GLEP 42 news items and package manager message logging functionality.

tr.ti: Pause for the specified number (must be a positive integer) of seconds. Defaults to a sane value.
Beep the specified number (must be a positive integer) of times. Defaults to a sane value.
Used by eclass authors to notify ebuild writers that they are using deprecated functionality.
